column5: Someone had their Tracker boat stolen from the Bluffers parking lot this morning. Â I am not sure of the specific model; but it was a pretty large boat. They parked at the public launch and left to help a friend pull a boat from the marina and their boat & trailer had been removed from their truck. Â I saw the boat around 7:00 am this morning. Â It was gone by 8:45 am. Â If anyone else saw the boat parked in the public launch between those times it may help narrow the time down a bit.
STOLEN BOAT  PLEASE CALL 9-1-1 TO REPORT SIGHTINGS  STOLEN FROM BLUFFERS PARK MARINA ON TRAILER ON THURSDAY AUGUST 13 BETWEEN 730-845am (black trailer with grey cover) Trailer plate S46 69E
Well hopefully there's insurance.Â  But why steal a cracker. Feel sad for the owner.
